name: part_001
file: tmp_【3D】みんなとの絆をチェックして、歌って重大告知を目指す！【#トワ様重大発表】 [t2j89jXBhO8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Tokoyami Towa and her friends (Subaru, Botan, Pekora, Mio) gather in a game center setting. Towa introduces the 'Danketsu Box' (Unity Box).
Nekomata Okayu appears (as a voice from the box) and explains the rules of the challenge: proving their unity through matching or differing poses to gain magic power.
The group discusses the challenge and prepares to enter separate partitions to perform the poses without seeing each other.
First Challenge: Match a pose that looks like Nekomata Okayu. They fail because Mio chose a different pose, leading to a comedic debate.
Second Challenge: Everyone must do a DIFFERENT pose that reminds them of Tokoyami Towa. They successfully complete this challenge.

subtitles.original: あーやばいやばいやばい！
subtitles.english: Ah, oh no, oh no, oh no!

subtitles.original: おかえりー！
subtitles.english: Welcome back!

subtitles.original: 速い速い！
subtitles.english: Fast, fast!

subtitles.original: あーなんかだけ…痛い痛い痛い！
subtitles.english: Ah, it's just... ow ow ow!

subtitles.original: アップだからいいけど、引きで見ると中々…
subtitles.english: It's fine because it's a close-up, but from a distance, it's quite...

subtitles.original: 引きで見るとみんな結構…進…進めてるね。
subtitles.english: From a distance, everyone's really... moving... moving along.

subtitles.original: うるさいわね！見なさい、見なさいこれ。
subtitles.english: Shut up! Look, look at this.

subtitles.original: うるさいわね、こちら見て。
subtitles.english: Shut up, look over here.

subtitles.original: 何？何これ？箱ジャンケン？
subtitles.english: What? What's this? Box rock-paper-scissors?

subtitles.original: これはね、あの…この箱には魔力を集めている恐ろしい猫が封じ込められている。
subtitles.english: This is, you see... inside this box, a terrifying cat that collects magic power is sealed away.

subtitles.original: 猫？何、猫？
subtitles.english: A cat? What, a cat?

subtitles.original: 猫なんている？いないよ。
subtitles.english: Are there cats? There aren't any.

subtitles.original: そうだ、今日猫いないじゃん。
subtitles.english: That's right, there are no cats today.

subtitles.original: さあ、まあこうやってね、あの、箱を擦り擦りすると…
subtitles.english: Now, if I rub the box like this...

subtitles.original: 擦り擦り？擦り擦り？
subtitles.english: Rubbing? Rubbing?

subtitles.original: 何？擦り擦り？
subtitles.english: What? Rubbing?

subtitles.original: うわ！何何？
subtitles.english: Whoa! What, what?

subtitles.original: 僕がこの団結ボックスの、猫だにゃ～。
subtitles.english: I'm the cat of this Unity Box-nya.

subtitles.original: 燻製？燻製じゃん。
subtitles.english: Smoked? It's smoked.

subtitles.original: 団結BOXの猫？
subtitles.english: Cat of the Unity Box?

subtitles.original: この箱から出すお題に合わせて、みんなの心が合っていることを証明できたら…
subtitles.english: If you can prove that your hearts are in sync with the prompts I give from this box...

subtitles.original: 僕の魔力をトワに分けてあげてもいいよ～。
subtitles.english: ...I might share some of my magic power with Towa.

subtitles.original: ええ、マジに？魔力！
subtitles.english: Wait, really? Magic power!

subtitles.original: まずは手始めに…
subtitles.english: First, for starters...

subtitles.original: 「猫又おかゆ」っぽいポーズを全員で揃えてみてね～。
subtitles.english: ...everyone try to match a 'Nekomata Okayu-like' pose together.

subtitles.original: ばにゃ～。
subtitles.english: Ba-nya!

subtitles.original: 何だこれ？
subtitles.english: What's this?

subtitles.original: え～、ということでこの猫が説明してくれたように…
subtitles.english: Well, as this cat explained...

subtitles.original: トワたちの心は一つにしてお題に答えていけば、魔力がもらえてトワは重大発表ができるんだよ！アンダースタン？
subtitles.english: If we make our hearts one and answer the prompts, we'll get magic power and I can make a major announcement! Understand?

subtitles.original: よく分かんないけど、まずはおかゆ先輩っぽいポーズを全員で揃えればいいってことぺこですな。
subtitles.english: I don't really get it, but basically we just need to match Okayu-senpai's pose together, peko.

subtitles.original: なんか今いち乗り…乗り切れてないんだけど。
subtitles.english: I'm not quite feeling it yet.

subtitles.original: そうみたいだね。
subtitles.english: Seems so.

subtitles.original: そうみたいだね。
subtitles.english: Seems so.

subtitles.original: すごいな、さすがぺこらちゃん！じゃ、みんな仕切りの中に入ってね！
subtitles.english: Amazing, as expected of Pekora-chan! Now, everyone get inside the partitions!

subtitles.original: はい、入りましたか？
subtitles.english: Okay, are you in?

subtitles.original: 入ったよー！
subtitles.english: We're in!

subtitles.original: ということでここからはお互いが見えない状態で、猫からのお題に答えていきます。
subtitles.english: So from here, we'll answer the cat's prompts while unable to see each other.

subtitles.original: あくまで猫呼びなんだね。
subtitles.english: You're sticking to calling her a cat.

subtitles.original: 猫又おかゆじゃなくて、猫っていう別の存在なんだね。
subtitles.english: So it's not Nekomata Okayu, but a different being called 'cat'.

subtitles.original: 湯気猫ね、湯気猫から。
subtitles.english: Steam-cat, from the steam-cat.

subtitles.original: え～、そうしましたら最初のお題は「猫又おかゆっぽいポーズを全員一致させろ」です！
subtitles.english: Well then, the first prompt is "Everyone match a Nekomata Okayu-like pose"!

subtitles.original: お題 猫又おかゆっぽいポーズを全員一致
subtitles.english: Prompt: Everyone match a Nekomata Okayu-like pose

subtitles.original: それでは団結ボックススタート！
subtitles.english: Now, Unity Box start!

subtitles.original: え、もうこれ行っちゃっていいの？
subtitles.english: Wait, can we just go?

subtitles.original: え、じゃあ決めた？みんな、決めたかな？
subtitles.english: Wait, decided? Everyone, have you decided?

subtitles.original: これしかないと思う。
subtitles.english: I think it can only be this.

subtitles.original: え、これマジで一緒じゃないといけないってことだよ。
subtitles.english: This means we really have to be the same.

subtitles.original: 行くよ、いい？もういいのね？行くよ！3、2、1、ポーズ！
subtitles.english: Here we go, ready? Ready now? Go! 3, 2, 1, pose!

subtitles.original: え、あれ？どうなんだ？
subtitles.english: Eh, wait? How is it?

subtitles.original: どう？どうだ？
subtitles.english: How? How is it?

subtitles.original: あれ？ミオちゃんしゃがんでね？
subtitles.english: Wait? Mio-chan, aren't you squatting?

subtitles.original: ミオちゃんだけしゃがんでね？他、一緒じゃない？
subtitles.english: Only Mio-chan is squatting? Aren't the others the same?

subtitles.original: 他、一緒っぽくない？一緒だ！ミオちゃん！
subtitles.english: Aren't the others the same? They are! Mio-chan!

subtitles.original: あれ？待って！今の失敗？それは
subtitles.english: Wait! Was that a fail?

subtitles.original: いやいやいや、これは猫又おかゆのビジュアルだよね、たしか。
subtitles.english: No no no, this is Nekomata Okayu's visual, surely.

subtitles.original: あるある！おめでとうございます！ってこうだったよね？
subtitles.english: It exists! It was like this for "Congratulations", right?

subtitles.original: 座ってもあったし、ポーズじゃない？
subtitles.english: There was a sitting one too, isn't it a pose?

subtitles.original: おうちで見たもん！
subtitles.english: I saw it at home!

subtitles.original: いない、あれはおかゆ。金曜ロードショーとかでなんか見そうな感じ。
subtitles.english: That's not Okayu. It looks like something you'd see on Friday Road Show.

subtitles.original: なんかちょっと、某、ね。トトロ的なやつ。
subtitles.english: Like some kind of... Totoro-like thing.

subtitles.original: これは…失敗！
subtitles.english: This is... a fail!

subtitles.original: ごめんトワ～、魔力、魔力～。
subtitles.english: Sorry Towa, magic power, magic power.

subtitles.original: そうだよ、トワ悪魔になりたいんだから。
subtitles.english: That's right, since Towa wants to become a demon.

subtitles.original: もう悪魔なんですけど！子悪魔だから！大悪魔になりてんだな。
subtitles.english: I'm already a demon! Just a small one! I want to become a great demon.

subtitles.original: じゃあそうしましたら仕切りをボーンと！
subtitles.english: Then, the partitions go boom!

subtitles.original: 開けて、次のお題はこちら、パン！
subtitles.english: Open, and the next prompt is this, bam!

subtitles.original: お題 常闇トワといえば？で思いつくポーズを全員バラバラ
subtitles.english: Prompt: When you think of Tokoyami Towa? Match a pose, but all different

subtitles.original: 「常闇トワといえば？」で思いつくポーズを全員バラバラだって！
subtitles.english: "When you think of Tokoyami Towa?" Match a pose, and everyone must be different!

subtitles.original: え、もうこれ今日のトワだったらあれになっちゃうけど。
subtitles.english: Eh, but if it's today's Towa, it'll be that one.

subtitles.original: あれだよね？それトワがやるから、それトワがやるから。
subtitles.english: It's that one, right? Since Towa will do that, Towa will do it.

subtitles.original: 今日のトワで、今日のトワで…
subtitles.english: With today's Towa, today's Towa...

subtitles.original: バラバラにしなきゃいけないんだよね。分かった、バラバラだよ。
subtitles.english: We have to be different, right. Got it, different.

subtitles.original: バラバラにしなきゃいけない。そうだね。トワっぽいポーズ、全員バラバラだ。
subtitles.english: We have to be different. Right. Towa-like poses, all different.

subtitles.original: そうだ。え、全員バラバラ？どうしよう。
subtitles.english: Right. Eh, all different? What should I do?

subtitles.original: じゃあトワはあれやるから、みんなはトワのやつやらないで。
subtitles.english: Then I'll do "that", so everyone don't do mine.

subtitles.original: えー！マジで？待って、決まってない！
subtitles.english: Eh! Seriously? Wait, it's not decided!

subtitles.original: 決まってないぞ！トワっぽいポーズたくさんあるでしょ？捨てるよ！何でもいいから！
subtitles.english: It's not decided! There are lots of Towa-like poses, right? I'll throw one out! Anything's fine!

subtitles.original: ね、確かに、いろんなポーズしているかもしれない。
subtitles.english: Yeah, certainly, she might be doing various poses.

subtitles.original: じゃあさ、でもいろんなポーズしているってことはさ、当たり範囲が広いってことだよ。
subtitles.english: Well then, but the fact she does various poses means the "hit range" is wide.

subtitles.original: じゃあいいですか？行きますよ！では、常闇トワっぽいポーズバラバラまで…
subtitles.english: Are you ready? Here we go! Now, Tokoyami Towa-like poses, different...

subtitles.original: お！あれ？どう？お！え、バラバラじゃん？
subtitles.english: Oh! Wait? How is it? Oh! Eh, aren't they all different?

subtitles.original: バラバラじゃん！これ正解じゃない？これは正解！
subtitles.english: They're all different! Isn't this correct? This is correct!

subtitles.original: やったー！おめでとうー！
subtitles.english: Yay! Congratulations!
